popover.primary: A mastery path focused on immediate, direct effects
A mastery path focused on longer-duration effects
A mastery path focused on wide-area effects

data.name: Reinforce War Engine
data.description: You heal the ram for 750 health over the next 5 seconds.

data.name: Cleanse War Engine
data.description: Siege Targetted cleanse. Removes two siege specific debuffs from a friendly siege engine.

data.name: Shield the Skies
data.description: Ranged siege engines will deal 90% of the normal damage to you. You will also protect two other group mates within 40 feet. Only one effect of this type may be on a player at a time.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Harbinger of Doom
data.description:
When this ability is toggled on, you are the Harbinger of Doom, converting your Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance bonuses from items into Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you are the Harbinger of Change, converting your Magic Power, Intelligence, and Magic Critical Chance bonuses from items into Healing Power, Willpower, and Healing Critical Chance.

data.name: Tzeentch's Cordial
data.description: Heals your target for 1700 over 15 seconds.

data.name: Chaotic Blur
data.description: Detaunts targets attack power to 50% for 15 seconds. You will also deal 50% damage to them until the effect is broken. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Warped Flesh
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch Shall Remake You
data.description: Tzeentch dislikes losing a pawn so soon. Your target is resurrected with 20% health so that Tzeentch may continue his game.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Divine Fury
data.description: You deal 25% more damage, but all of your casted heals become 20% less effective.

data.name: Endless Gifts
data.description: Cooldown on Glimpse of Chaos is reduced by 5s and the cost increased by 15 Action Points.

data.name: Glimpse of Chaos
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Hexed
data.description: You call upon the power of chaos, removing one Curse or Hex from your defensive target.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Increases your Willpower by 160.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Increases your Elemental resistance by 252.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Embrace the Warp
data.description: You embrace the Warp, surrounding yourself with its power. You will take only 50% damage and your abilities will cost 25% fewer Action Points for 10 seconds. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.

data.name: Scourged Warping
data.description: Warp Reality will now deals 10% more damage, and every tick of damage has a 20% chance of making the next Scourge cast within 10 seconds instant cast.

data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 Elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Breath of Tzeentch
data.description: All opponents within 30 feet of you are knocked back, and monsters are knocked down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Warping The Spirit
data.description: Each tick of Tzeentch's Cordial has 25% chance to increase target's armor by 1056 for 10 seconds. Additionally, 10% less armor will be bypassed when they are attacked.

data.name: Tzeentch's Talon
data.description: Reduces your target's armor by 1320 and all resistances by 504 for 15 seconds.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 Action Points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Blessing of Chaos
data.description: Critical heals will Bless your target for 10 seconds, increasing the power of any heals used on them by 25%.

data.name: Eye of Sheerian
data.description: Increase the armor of all group mates within 100 feet by 1320 and resists by 504 for 10 seconds.

data.name: Empowered Alteration
data.description: Leaping Alteration will also restore 48 Action Points over 9 seconds.

data.name: By Tzeentch's Will!
data.description: Critical direct heals will increase your morale by 75. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Suppressing The Fragile Unbelievers
data.description: You silence disbelievers and inflict 1218 damage over 7 seconds within 30 feet around you.

data.name: Drink Deeply
data.description: Tzeentch's Cordial will now heal an additional 220 health after the effect ends.

data.name: Waves of Chaos
data.description: Rituals will now pulse 150 Corporeal damage to all targets within 30 feet every 3 seconds based on Mastery level of the Ritual.

data.name: Mark of Remaking
data.description:
The groupmember bearing this Mark can resurrect themselves if killed in the next 10 minutes. In addition, the bearer's Toughness is increased by 80 for 1 hour.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Scourge
data.description: Power lashes out and inflicts 377 Corporeal damage.

data.name: Flash of Chaos
data.description: A burst of chaos that restores 381 health to an ally.

data.name: Mark of Daemonic Fury
data.description:
Increases a groupmember's Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Intelligence by 80. The bearer of this Mark may also activate it like an ability to inflict 321 Corporeal damage.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Tzeentch's Cry
data.description: A quick bolt of power that deals 321 Corporeal damage.

data.name: Elixir Of Dark Blessings
data.description:
Heals your target for 1258 health.
This is a fragile spell, and will sometimes be set back by a small amount if you are damaged while casting it.

data.name: Daemonic Fortitude
data.description: Increases target's Wounds by 160 for 60 seconds and then heals the recipient for the amount increased.

data.name: Chaotic Force
data.description: The Critical chance on Tzeentch's Cry, Scourge and Flash of Chaos is raised by 15%.

data.name: Ritual of Innervation
data.note: You may only have 1 Ritual active
data.description: A frenzied, 30 seconds long ritual that affects all group members within 100 feet, granting them a 20% chance to regain 50 Action Points every attack.

data.name: Manipulation
data.description: Any time you directly heal someone, there is a  25% chance your offensive target will take corporeal damage equal to 25% of the healed value.

data.name: Boon of Tzeentch
data.description: Drains 426 health from your target, funneling 150% of the amount drained into your defensive target.

data.name: Changer's Touch
data.description: Critical direct damage hits place a debuff on your target that reduces all incoming healing by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Aethyric Shock
data.description: Overwhelms your opponent with power, inflicting 396 Corporeal damage and Staggers the target for up to 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Tzeentch’s Shielding
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet are granted 250 Action Points, and for 20 seconds, everyone will absorb up to 5400 damage.

data.name: Warp Reality
data.description: Inflicts 830 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Veil of Chaos
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your target will absorb up to 825 damage. When the effect fades they will regain 246 health.

data.name: Dark Medicine
data.description: Restores 370 health to an ally, and then restores an additional 445 health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Mark of the Spell Destroyer
data.description:
Increases a groupmember's Initiative and Willpower by 80. The bearer of this Mark may activate it like an ability to inflict 768 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Tzeentch's Lash
data.description: Inflicts 525 Corporeal damage over 4 seconds and silences the target, preventing them from using any magic.

data.name: Lashing Waves
data.description: Tzeentch's Lash will now strike all opponents within 20 feet of your initial target.

data.name: Ritual of Superiority
data.note: You may only have 1 Ritual active
data.description: A Ritual of dominance that lasts for 30 seconds, granting group members in the radius a 20% chance when taking damage to active a shield that will absorb 487 damage for up to 10 seconds. Will not trigger more than once every 2 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Refreshment
data.description: Direct heals have a 25% chance to grant your target 50 AP, but will not restore AP to yourself.

data.name: Storm of Ravens
data.description: Channeled. Deals 1848 Corporeal damage over 6 seconds and snaring them by 40%. 100% chance to be setback while casting.

data.name: Transference
data.description: While under the effects of your Harbinger of Doom; each time you deal direct damage, your defensive target is healed for 50% of the damage dealt.

data.name: Mirror of Madness
data.description: Curses your target for 10 seconds so that whenever they cast a direct heal, it inflicts 547 Corporeal damage to them. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Tzeentch's Scream
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet are healed for 2790 health over 15 seconds and regain 25 Action Points every second for 15 seconds

data.name: Rite of Agony
data.description: Pains washes over enemies within 30 feet of you, inflicting 264 Corporeal damage.

data.name: Mark of the Vortex
data.description:
Increases all your groupmember's resistances by 252. The bearer of this Mark may activate it to inflict 474 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds to all targets within 30 feet.
You may only give a player one Mark, but players may bear multiple Marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Leaping Alteration
data.description: A bolt of healing energy which instantly leaps to allies within 30 feet of the last affected, restoring 729 health over 9 seconds. This effect will only pass through each target once, and will affect up to 6 allies.

data.name: Demon Spittle
data.description: Spews a vile mixture over everything 40 feet in front of you, dealing 636 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds to all opponents.

data.name: Dust of Pandemonium
data.description: All group members within 100 feet of you are healed for 898.

data.name: Sweeping Disgorgement
data.description: Demon Spittle grows ever more corrosive and now also reduces Armor by 990 and Corporeal resistance by 378.

data.name: Ritual of Lunacy
data.note: You may only have 1 Ritual active
data.description: A dark Ritual lasting 30 seconds that infuses your group with the souls of the fallen,  restoring 215 health every 3 seconds to those within 100 feet of the Ritual.

data.name: Swirling Vortex
data.description: Mark of the Vortex's granted ability will now hit all enemies within 30 feet of the caster, and will last for 15 seconds

data.name: Chaotic Agitation
data.description: You channel dark forces into your target and all targets within 30 feet of them, dealing 307 Corporeal damage every 2 seconds for up to 6 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Grip
data.description: Direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to create a shield on your target that can absorb up to 712 damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Wind of Insanity
data.description:
You securely root yourself in place to call fourth ferocious winds for up to 6 seconds that inflict 234 Corporeal damage every second to targets within 30 feet of you. The fierce winds will knock back players a short distance without granting them immunity, and will knock down monsters for 3 seconds. Targets cannot be knocked back more than once every 1.5 seconds.
This spell may be toggled off to regain your movement.

data.name: Windblock
data.description: Inflicts 1200 damage to all targets within 25 feet of you, making heals 50% less effective on them for 10 seconds.
